Articles.Content:
Hi! Hello! And ... yeah.

My name is ElectroxSoldier, I\'m aged 16 and I\'m Irish. The sad thing about me is that I live in France, well not that sad but the most common question I get is 'What the heck is an Irishman doing in France?'. Meh, parents .

Enough of that, I discovered Kerbal Space Program thanks to KurtJMac who I\'ve been following since the beginning of his Far Lands or Bust series in Minecraft. When I first saw this game I don\'t know why but I thought it\'d be long and dull, but the more Kurt played during his first episode, the more I wanted to play as Jebediah Kerman .

Yeah so I immediately loved the game and finally bought it (Screw demo, The game is what I need!).

Ever since I\'ve been playing, failing, crying, laughing, smashing, etc. with KSP.

I\'m so impatient to see how this game is going to evolve through the updates, 0.15 was awesome but I think I\'m gonna, pardon my french, jizz my pants with 0.16.

Anyway, that\'s all I can think about for now, got any questions, feel free to ask.

Ciao.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
